tool_description: Manages and validates overlap between text chunks, ensuring proper overlap ratios and handling edge cases.

chunks.description: Array of text chunks to process

target_overlap_chars.description: Target number of overlapping characters between chunks

fix_overlap_issues.description: Whether to automatically fix overlap problems

error_messages: Empty chunks array: Provide at least one chunk for overlap processing.
Invalid overlap chars: Target overlap characters must be non-negative and reasonable for chunk sizes.
Overlap validation failed: Chunks do not have consistent overlap as expected.
Cannot fix overlap: Automatic overlap fixing failed due to incompatible chunk sizes.
usage: Provide chunks array and target_overlap_chars, optionally enable validation and auto-fixing. Returns processed chunks with proper overlap.

processed_chunks.description: Array of chunks with validated/corrected overlap

overlap_ratios.description: Actual overlap ratios between consecutive chunks

overlap_issues_fixed.description: Number of overlap issues automatically corrected
